definition[0]: easy to see, notice, or understand
example[0]: Bob ate his lunch with evident enjoyment.
example[1]: It was evident that she was unhappy.
example[2]: It soon became evident that she was seriously ill.
example[3]: It was clearly evident that the company was in financial difficulties.
example[4]: It was evident to me that he was not telling the truth.
example[5]: The growing popularity of the subject is evident in the numbers of students wanting to study it.
